name: Weather.com Dark Mode
description: weather.com / The Weather Channel dark theme for Stylus.
additional_info:
Please report missing or broken dark theme elements in comments.

v0.0.1 - 1st pass for dark theme. Probably need to update colors for severe weather alerts (currently only adjusted for alert level 4). Only did a quick pass over the main areas of the site (news, hourly/daily/monthly forecasts).

v1.0.0 - First major version. All areas of the site I normally use have been themed. Future updates will likely only happen when I notice issues in my normal use.

Added dark theme for the following areas:
Monthly -> Current day indicator, N/A "--" indicator visibility
Monthly -> Almanac
More Forecasts -> menu "Yesterday" text/background color
More Forecasts -> Allergy/Boat/Farming -> allow color image backgrounds to show through
More Forecasts -> Allergy/Boat/Farming -> text/background colors
More Forecasts -> Cold&Flu/Fishing -> text/background colors
More Forecasts -> Ski -> text/background colors
